scripts.brosta: { echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' ; browserify --node src/sta.js ; } > bin/sta.js ; chmod +x bin/sta.js
scripts.broquartus: { echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' ; browserify --node src/quartus.js ; } > bin/quartus.js ; chmod +x bin/quartus.js
scripts.brosynplify: { echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' ; browserify --node src/synplify.js ; } > bin/synplify.js ; chmod +x bin/synplify.js
scripts.prepublish: mkdir -p bin && npm run brosta && npm run broquartus && npm run brosynplify
